name: Skatezilla
description:
This game was created for the Trijam #158, with the theme "Force of nature".

I made the game solo, with between 3h and 3h30 of work. I made all the assets except for the explosion animation, and did the coding with Unity.

Use arrows to go up and down, and the goal is to destroy everything in your path.

There is no victory or game over condition, and the scroll speed doesn't grow over time. So just stop when you had enough 😅!
